description: Detect indirect command execution via Program Compatibility Assistant (pcalua.exe or forfiles.exe). Author: E.M. Anhaus (originally from Atomic Blue Detections, Endgame), oscd.community. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: Need to use extra processing with 'unique_count' / 'filter' to focus on outliers as opposed to commonly seen artifacts.
name: Indirect Command Execution
